hero.description: I care a lot about developing products for positive impact! I can build APIs, Websites, Mobile Apps, and much more...

about.title: About me
about.description: I'm an experienced software developer focused on build apps for any size company. I have experience to develop your backend API, your frontend and your mobile app. I have 6+ years of experience.

tech-stack.title:
What could
I help you?
tech-stack.description: I work with technologies such as NodeJS, ReactJS, React Native, NextJS, NestJS, Flutter, Docker, AWS, Databases and much more. Please don't hesitate to contact me to find out what I can do for you!

services.title: My services
services.description: I care a lot about developing products for positive impact! I can build APIs, Websites, Mobile Apps, and much more...

array.title: Web development
array.subtitle: I can develop your web platform, landing pages, and any other system based on web technologies.

array.title: Mobile app
array.subtitle: I can develop any type of mobile applications. I've worked for banking, finance, pharmaceutical, e-commerces companies.

array.title: API
array.subtitle: I can build your API using NodeJS, Express JS, NestJS, databases such as MongoDB, PostgreSQL, MySQL.

array.title: Desktop
array.subtitle: I can build your desktop application using Flutter.
